rows.label: tlk70000015_10_msg0001
rows.name:
Thank you all for helping
Chairman Morumo so much.

rows.label: tlk70000015_10_msg0002
rows.name:
I think a lot has happened
that I don't know about,
but I'm not going to ask.

rows.label: tlk70000015_10_msg0003
rows.name:
From here on out, I promise to do everything
I can to support you. It's all I can
offer in return for your kindness.

rows.label: tlk70000015_10_msg0004
rows.name:
No matter what happened in the
past, if Chairman Morumo is in
debt to someone, then I am, too.
